group_1.textRight: ...Alright, I've sent Kanagi and the others home.
I said we'd give them a call if we found anything out.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much.
I've contacted the other girls who were involved@with filming, too.

group_1.textRight: Telling them to be careful?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. ...Although I'm not sure how much good@"being careful" will do, in this case.

group_1.textRight: ...And your two friends?

group_1.textLeft: Mikura is still feeling a little dizzy, so she's resting@in the room next door.
Seira was tending to her, but...
I think she was pretty tired, so she passed out on@the sofa a minute ago.
...She was acting like Ruri the entire time.
What on earth is going on?

group_1.textRight: Based on what we've heard from Kira...
There's been more than a few suspicious@happenings lately.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.
Rumors that relitigated the embers of East-West@discord began to crop up...
...as if in response to the themes of our film.

group_1.textRight: ...Rumors, huh.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, so you're our latest guests?

group_1.textRight: I heard about what happened, and thought it best@that I come over.

group_1.textLeft: Good timing. I'd been wanting to hear your opinion,@too.

group_1.textRight: Mine?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, Hiiragi.
This incident... I take it that it's not a [textBlue:Rumor] you created?

group_1.narration: "[textBlue:Rumors]" would often cause@bizarre incidents like this in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: I'm quite concerned about this case, myself.
I believe it may be a more dire problem than it@first appears.
I may require all of your cooperation, as well.

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright.

group_1.textRight: But, alas...

group_1.textLeft: | We found no evidence of an Uwasa being@involved this time. |

group_1.textRight: I'm just as clueless about the cause as you are.@For once, there are no [textBlue:Rumors] involved.

group_1.textLeft: If it's not a [textBlue:Rumor], what could it be...?
Could it have something to do with a Magical Girl's@wish?
For instance...
Thanks to the effect of her wish...
Mihono always finds herself with a healthy film@budget on hand.

group_1.textRight: That's why Yukika is always getting into trouble, too.
It's a possibility... but at the moment, it's too broad@of one.
We currently have no clues as to whose wish could@be at work, or what it's caused.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed. We ought to explore other possibilities@before starting in on that.
Oh? Komachi...@Are you doing alright now?

group_1.textRight: ...I do beg your pardon, young ladies, but...@where exactly am I?
She's still "Tsukihiko"?

group_1.textLeft: Have you lost your memory of being Komachi...?

group_1.textRight: What are you talking about?@My name's Tsukihiko...

group_1.textLeft: Komachi...
...Please remember.@Please come back to us...!

group_1.textRight: H-huh?@...Kira?
What was I...?

group_1.textLeft: You're back?!
You were acting like the lead character in your@movie until just a minute ago.

group_1.textRight: ...Like Tsukihiko?
Hm...@Could this be...?

group_1.textLeft: Did you figure something out?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
This might be because your unique magics are@interacting with one another...

group_1.textLeft: Our...

group_1.textRight: ...unique magics?
Right.
I received a detailed account of your filming sessions@from Sakurako on the way here...
So I've been speculating as to the cause of this situation.
What I just witnessed was the last piece of@the puzzle.

group_1.textLeft: So you know what's causing all this?

group_1.textRight: ...Well, it's only a hypothesis.
The first piece was Seira Mihono's magic...
Her "stage direction."
